Put the IB Gateway installer file into this folder before you start the build.
They are not part of the git repo to save space and bandwith.

Donwload the x64 Linux version from the Interactive Brokers Homepage or 
release history (https://github.com/waytrade/ib-gateway-docker/releases) and name it like this:

ibgateway-<VERSION>-standalone-linux-x64.sh
